skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Quick review of a few books that inspire me this week to continue working towards success in my business. Blueprint to Business by Michael Alden, Grit The Power of Passion and Perseverance by Angela Duckworth, and I will teach you to be Rich by Ramit Sethi. Also have a free offer visit www.facebook.com/jenstarmedia and request a free copy of The Power of Positive Thinking. Learn more about my online and offline business at www.jenstarmedia.com or www.growalocalbusiness.com
